item.title: added HarperDb

item.title: Updated outdated information about Shippable.

item.title: Reduced length.
item.description: https://jfrog.com/start-free/ - An artifact repository that supports package formats including Alpine, Maven, Gradle, Docker, Cargo, Conda, Conan, Debian, Go, Helm, Vagrant, YUM, P2, Ivy, NuGet, PHP, NPM, RubyGems, PyPI, Bower, CocoaPods, GitLFS, Opkg, SBT, and more.

item.title: Added information about Artifactory.
item.description: https://jfrog.com/start-free/)] - A universal artifact repository that supports all major package formats including Alpine, Maven, Gradle, Docker, Cargo, Conda, Conan, Debian, Go, Helm, Vagrant, YUM, P2, Ivy, NuGet, PHP, NPM, RubyGems, PyPI, Bower, CocoaPods, GitLFS, Opkg, SBT, and more. Free tier of JFrog Platform incudes Artifactory, XRay (a universal software composition analysis solution), and Pipelines (CI/CD, workflow, and tool orchestration tool. - A universal artifact repository that supports all major package formats including Alpine, Maven, Gradle, Docker, Cargo, Conda, Conan, Debian, Go, Helm, Vagrant, YUM, P2, Ivy, NuGet, PHP, NPM, RubyGems, PyPI, Bower, CocoaPods, GitLFS, Opkg, SBT, and more. Free tier of JFrog Platform incudes Artifactory, XRay (a universal software composition analysis solution), and Pipelines (CI/CD, workflow, and tool orchestration tool.)

item.title: Updated informaton about Artifactory.
item.description: https://central.sonatype.org - The default artifact repository for Apache Maven, SBT and other build systems.

item.title: Updated information about Artifactory.
item.description:
https://jfrog.com/start-free/)] - JFrog Artifactory offers a universal solution supporting all major package formats including Alpine, Maven, Gradle, Docker, Cargo, Conda, Conan, Debian, Go, Helm, Vagrant, YUM, P2, Ivy, NuGet, PHP, NPM, RubyGems, PyPI, Bower, CocoaPods, GitLFS, Opkg, SBT, and more. Free tier of JFrog Platform incudes Artifactory, XRay (a universal software composition analysis solution), and Pipelines (CI/CD, workflow, and tool orchestration tool. - JFrog Artifactory offers a universal solution supporting all major package formats including Alpine, Maven, Gradle, Docker, Cargo, Conda, Conan, Debian, Go, Helm, Vagrant, YUM, P2, Ivy, NuGet, PHP, NPM, RubyGems, PyPI, Bower, CocoaPods, GitLFS, Opkg, SBT, and more. Free tier of JFrog Platform incudes Artifactory, XRay (a universal software composition analysis solution), and Pipelines (CI/CD, workflow, and tool orchestration tool.)
https://central.sonatype.org - default artifact repository for Apache Maven, SBT and other build systems.

item.title: Added two new services.
item.description:
https://gforge.com - Project Management & Issue Tracking toolset for complex projects with self-premises and SaaS options. SaaS free plan offers first 5 users free & free for Open Source Projects.
https://paiza.cloud/en/ - Develop Web apps in Browser without having the need to setup anything. Free Plan offers 1 server with 24 hours lifetime and 4 hours running time per day with 2 CPU cores, 2 GB RAM and 1 GB storage.

item.title: Added 2 new services.
item.description:
https://www.ntaskmanager.com/ - Project management software that enables your teams tn collaborate, plan, analyze and manage everyday tasks. Basic Plan free forever with 100 MB storage, 5 users/team. Unlimited workspaces, meetings,tasks, timesheets and issue tracking.
https://storj.io - Decentralised Private Cloud Storage for Apps and Developers. Free plan provides 3 Projects, 50 GB storage per project/month , 50 GB bandwidth per project/month.

item.title: Add Scraper's Proxy
item.description: https://scrapersproxy.com) — Simple HTTP proxy API made for scraping. Scrape anonymously without having to worry about restrictions, blocks or captchas.
